name: The story of Vitess with Deepthi Sigireddi, Vitess Maintainer and Tech Lead (The Changelog #485)
summary: This week we’re joined by Deepthi Sigireddi, Vitess Maintainer and engineer at PlanetScale — of course we’re talking about all things Vitess. We talk about its origin inside YouTube, how Vitess handles sharding, Deepthi’s journey to Vitess maintainer, when you should begin using it, and how it fits into cloud native in...
